name: Incremental Cubes [Prototype4v2]
description:
I found a bug in prototype4v2.

(Bug that prevents you from proceeding from phase5)

The bug was fixed and the new version is now available.

Please play this version.

You can save the game locally by clicking the gear icon in the upper right corner.

Please load the saved data from there to the new version. https://tenpastudio.itch.io/incremental-cubes-prototype4v3


If you are having trouble seeing the cube, try the following We received this information from someone who has actually played the game.

1: chrome://settings
2: scroll to the bottom, click advanced
3: turn hardware accel ON (mine was off) cubes visible :)

Here's the link w/ the step by step w/ pics if anyone else needs it https://www.interplaylearning.com/en/help/how-to-enable-webgl-in-chrome
